title: Toast
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar, lounge, and grill. The regular menu offers pub/junk food (not for vegans), but on Tuesday nights it offers a vegan special which changes weekly and published on its facebook -- must reserve ahead if you want the special. Past sample dishes included spaghetti squash with lentil meatballs and raw zucchini noodles with portobello steak strips over spring mix.
